verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> abode יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel בַּשִּׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7851><s%> in Shittim וַיָּ֣חֶל <S%H2490><s%> began הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people לִזְנ֖וֹת <S%H2181><s%> to commit whoredom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> with the daughters מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab

וַתִּקְרֶ֣אןָ <S%H7121><s%> And they called לָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people לְזִבְחֵ֖י <S%H2077><s%> unto the sacrifices אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ן <S%H430><s%> of their gods וַיֹּ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> did eat הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֖וּ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed down לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H430><s%> to their gods

וַיִּצָּ֥מֶד <S%H6775><s%> joined יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel לְבַ֣עַל פְּע֑וֹר <S%H1187><s%> himself unto Baalpeor וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> and the anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> against Israel

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses קַ֚ח <S%H3947><s%> Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> all the heads הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְהוֹקַ֥ע <S%H3363><s%> and hang them up אוֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD נֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> against the sun וְיָשֹׁ֛ב <S%H7725><s%> may be turned away חֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> that the fierce אַף־ <S%H639><s%> anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> from Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שֹׁפְטֵ֖י <S%H8199><s%> unto the judges יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִרְגוּ֙ <S%H2026><s%> Slay אִ֣ישׁ <S%H582><s%> his men אֲנָשָׁ֔יו <S%H582><s%> who הַנִּצְמָדִ֖ים <S%H6775><s%> that were joined לְבַ֥עַל פְּעֽוֹר׃ <S%H1187><s%> unto Baalpeor

וְהִנֵּ֡ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> And behold one מִבְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בָּ֗א <S%H935><s%> came וַיַּקְרֵ֤ב <S%H7126><s%> and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> unto his brethren אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּדְיָנִ֔ית <S%H4084><s%> a Midianitish woman לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses וּלְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> and in the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> of all the congregation בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they בֹכִ֔ים <S%H1058><s%> who [were] weeping פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> [before] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וַיַּ֗רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw פִּֽינְחָס֙ <S%H6372><s%> And when Phinehas בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> [it] he rose up מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from among הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> the congregation וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> and took רֹ֖מַח <S%H7420><s%> a javelin בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand

וַ֠יָּבֹא <S%H935><s%> And he went אַחַ֨ר <S%H310><s%> after אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> the man יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> through הַקֻּבָּ֗ה <S%H6898><s%> into the tent וַיִּדְקֹר֙ <S%H1856><s%> and thrust אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8147><s%> both אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of them through the man יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> and the woman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> through קֳבָתָ֑הּ <S%H6897><s%> her belly וַתֵּֽעָצַר֙ <S%H6113><s%> was stayed הַמַּגֵּפָ֔ה <S%H4046><s%> So the plague מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> from the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיִּהְי֕וּ <S%H1961><s%> become הַמֵּתִ֖ים <S%H4191><s%> And those that died בַּמַּגֵּפָ֑ה <S%H4046><s%> in the plague אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> and four וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> were twenty אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

פִּֽינְחָ֨ס <S%H6372><s%> Phinehas בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶלְעָזָ֜ר <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest הֵשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמָתִי֙ <S%H2534><s%> my wrath מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> from the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּקַנְא֥וֹ <S%H7068><s%> for my sake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִנְאָתִ֖י <S%H7068><s%> in my jealousy בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> among וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not כִלִּ֥יתִי <S%H3615><s%> them that I consumed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> not the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּקִנְאָתִֽי׃ <S%H7068><s%> my jealousy

לָכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אֱמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> Wherefore say הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> Behold I give ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִ֖י <S%H1285><s%> unto him my covenant שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> of peace

וְהָ֤יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> become לּוֹ֙ וּלְזַרְע֣וֹ <S%H2233><s%> And he shall have it and his seed אַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> after בְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> him [even] the covenant כְּהֻנַּ֣ת <S%H3550><s%> priesthood עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> of an everlasting תַּ֗חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> because קִנֵּא֙ <S%H7065><s%> he was zealous לֵֽאלֹהָ֔יו <S%H430><s%> for his God וַיְכַפֵּ֖ר <S%H3722><s%> and made an atonement עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> for the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְשֵׁם֩ <S%H8034><s%> Now the name אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of the Israelite יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַמֻּכֶּ֗ה <S%H5221><s%> that was slain אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who הֻכָּה֙ <S%H5221><s%> [even] that was slain אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הַמִּדְיָנִ֔ית <S%H4084><s%> with the Midianitish woman זִמְרִ֖י <S%H2174><s%> [was] Zimri בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son סָל֑וּא <S%H5543><s%> of Salu נְשִׂ֥יא <S%H5387><s%> a prince בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אָ֖ב <S%H1><s%> of a chief לַשִּׁמְעֹנִֽי׃ <S%H8099><s%> among the Simeonites

וְשֵׁ֨ם <S%H8034><s%> And the name הָֽאִשָּׁ֧ה <S%H802><s%> woman הַמֻּכָּ֛ה <S%H5221><s%> that was slain הַמִּדְיָנִ֖ית <S%H4084><s%> of the Midianitish כָּזְבִּ֣י <S%H3579><s%> [was] Cozbi בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter צ֑וּר <S%H6698><s%> of Zur רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> he [was] head אֻמּ֥וֹת <S%H523><s%> over a people בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אָ֛ב <S%H1><s%> [and] of a chief בְּמִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> in Midian הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> who פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying
צָר֖וֹר <S%H6887><s%> Vex אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּדְיָנִ֑ים <S%H4084><s%> the Midianites וְהִכִּיתֶ֖ם <S%H5221><s%> and smite אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for צֹרְרִ֥ים <S%H6887><s%> For they vex הֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like לָכֶ֔ם בְּנִכְלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5231><s%> you with their wiles אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִכְּל֥וּ <S%H5230><s%> wherewith they have beguiled לָכֶ֖ם עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> you in the matter פְּע֑וֹר <S%H6465><s%> of Peor וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and in דְּבַ֞ר <S%H1697><s%> and in the matter כָּזְבִּ֨י <S%H3579><s%> of Cozbi בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter נְשִׂ֤יא <S%H5387><s%> of a prince מִדְיָן֙ <S%H4080><s%> of Midian אֲחֹתָ֔ם <S%H269><s%> their sister הַמֻּכָּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> which was slain בְיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> in the day הַמַּגֵּפָ֖ה <S%H4046><s%> of the plague עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> sake פְּעֽוֹר׃ <S%H6465><s%> for Peor's וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after that הַמַּגֵּפָ֑ה <S%H4046><s%> of the plague פ
